text: The Arrogant Worms are a Canadian musical comedy trio that parodies many musical genres. They have played in not just Canada, but also in the United States and Australia as well. ==Other websites== * Official website * Official blog (not recently updated and no longer linked to on the main site) * "Carrot Juice Is Murder" ** lyrics ** MP3 and Real Audio (authorized) *The Get Stupid! Website Category:Canadian musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in Canada
title: The Arrogant Worms
